channel.title: Witch(Neutral Offensive)(Could use a new name)
channel.description:
# [Color=white]Witch[/color] **Unique Neutral Offensive**
Purpose: To make players doubt CW and drunk claims
> **Passive 1: Dark Aura-** Immune to most occupation and redirection abilities. Immune to death at night once. **Passive 2: Dark Blood-** Same as Royal Blood **Night Ability 1: Voodoo(Uses: Unlimited)-** Cause your first target to instead target your second target. **Night Ability 2: Whirlwind(Uses: 3)-** Cause all players targeting one of your targets to instead target the other target. Does not bypass immunity **Day Ability 1: Enrage(Uses: 3)-** Your night abilities will bypass immunities tonight. **Day Ability 2: Fabricate(Uses: 1)-** Anyone you redirect tonight will not be notified of the redirection.
**Win Condition-** Survive to see the Blue Dragon's defeat

item.title: Witch(Neutral Offensive)(Could use a new name)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
well this one is to do both and is thus neither of the 2 you listed

Read full topic

item.title: Witch(Neutral Offensive)(Could use a new name)
item.dc:creator: Soulshade55r
item.description:
Still disagree with making a false difficulty.

It’s not a bad witch if they out evils in there death note, They lost if they die.

It’s easily going to find killers.

My point is surviving for a NE isn’t needed unless you want to put fake difficulty onto a class.

The job of a NE is to help evils not be hard to win or survive

Read full topic

item.source: Witch(Neutral Offensive)(Could use a new name)

item.title: Witch(Neutral Offensive)(Could use a new name)
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
Soulshade55r:

Witch is able to control people do you hear yourself?

They can find evils like that duh. The only reason for a ne to survive is to make it harder when it doesn’t need to be.

Witch can’t find the classes of the evils though. And it’s still a bad play for them to out evils

Soulshade55r:

This isn’t Tos, that game isn’t even good or balanced let’s add spy because tos did it let’s add psychic ect.

I never said that.

Soulshade55r:

Worst off evils might kill Ne’s at the end for the fun of it I’ve had it happen plenty of times in Tos

That’s why I added night immunity. And stop comparing ToL to ToS.

Soulshade55r:

Did you know that if you control someone into someone and they die

That doesn’t mean that the player you controlled is a killer. They could just be an unlucky sheriff. And controlling evils twice isn’t a good play. You’re more useful controlling BD

Soulshade55r:

But nez should have the same wincon

Scorned is also a NE yet has a different win con.

Read full topic
